Detector

class sspike.detectors.Detector(name)

Detector specific information.

Parameters

name (str) – Detector name in SNOwGLoBES (and sspike (copying SNOwGLoBES ( ;) ))).

N_p

Number of target protons for ‘kamland’ or None.

Type

float

N_e

Number of target electrons for ‘kamland’ or None.

Type

float

low_cut

Low energy threshold [GeV].

Type

float

sspike_functions

Names of functions to use from sspike.pnut.

Type

list of str

total_files

Names of event files to include in pnut.event_totals().

Type

list of str

Note

name is also an attribute.

get_save_dir(sn)

Directory path for detector depdendent sspike outputs.

Parameters

sn (sspike.Supernova) – Supernova specifications.

Returns

path – Directory path for detector depdendent sspike outputs.

Return type

str

keep_vis(totals)

Final event selection from processed file totals.

Parameters

totals (pd.DataFrame) – Results of pnut.get_totals()

Returns

vis – Selected results based on detector processing types.

Return type

pd.DataFrame

Usage example:

from sspike.detectors import Detector

detector = Detector('kamland')
